cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5914, Empowering States to Protect Seniors from Bad Actors Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 196 (Tuesday, November 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOTTHEIMER:
H.R. 5914.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18: To make all laws that
shall be necessary and proper for carrying into execution the
foregoing powers, and all powers vested by this Constitution
in the government of the United States, or in any department
or officer thereof.
[Page H6242]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Empowering States to Protect Seniors from Bad Actors Act
